trans-unit.target: Normalmente, las aplicaciones no establecerá una voz <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: Para seleccionar una voz en función de otras características, vea el otro <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> sobrecargas.

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para seleccionar una voz por su nombre, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Flujo al que se va a anexar la salida de síntesis.

trans-unit.source: The format to use for the synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Formato que se va a usar para la salida de síntesis.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para anexar el resultado a una secuencia de audio.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> para liberar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>de referencia a la secuencia.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para usar otras opciones de configuración de salida, vea el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to send output to the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Configura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para enviar la salida al dispositivo de audio predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Sound** window in the Windows **Control Panel** to configure the default audio device for the computer.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el **sonido** ventana en las ventanas de **el Panel de Control** para configurar el dispositivo de audio predeterminado para el equipo.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para usar otras opciones de configuración de salida, vea el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the synthesizer to speak a phrase to the default audio output.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se utiliza el sintetizador hablar una frase a la salida de audio predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to not send output from synthesis operations to a device, file, or stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para no enviar los resultados de las operaciones de síntesis a un dispositivo, un archivo o un flujo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> ‘s reference to a file or stream.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este método para liberar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> de referencia a un archivo o secuencia.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> para obtener un ejemplo.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para usar otras opciones de configuración de salida, vea el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file.
trans-unit.target: Configura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para anexar la salida a un archivo con formato de audio de forma de onda.

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the file, reconfigure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para liberar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>referencia en el archivo, vuelva a configurar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>de salida, por ejemplo, mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para usar otras opciones de configuración de salida, vea el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveStream%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: Ruta de acceso al archivo.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a file that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: Configura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para anexar la salida a un archivo que contiene audio de formato de forma de onda.

trans-unit.source: To configure the output and specify the audio format, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar la salida y especificar el formato de audio, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an instance of <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> to play a prompt that has been output to a .wav file.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se utiliza una instancia de <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> para reproducir un mensaje que ha sido la salida a un archivo WAV.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> call is asynchronous, the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> instance is created (and the <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A> method invoked) in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Dado que el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> llamada es asincrónica, el <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer> se crea la instancia (y el <xref:System.Media.SoundPlayer.Play%2A> método invocado) en el controlador de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: Ruta de acceso al archivo.

trans-unit.source: The audio format information.
trans-unit.target: Información de formato de audio.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a Waveform audio format file in a specified format.
trans-unit.target: Configura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para anexar la salida a un archivo de formato de audio de forma de onda en un formato especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example specifies the format of the output of speech synthesis and sends it to a WAV file.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se especifica el formato de la salida de síntesis de voz y lo envía a un archivo WAV.

trans-unit.source: The stream to which to append synthesis output.
trans-unit.target: Flujo al que se va a anexar la salida de síntesis.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object to append output to a stream that contains Waveform format audio.
trans-unit.target: Configura el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> para anexar la salida a un flujo que contiene audio de formato de forma de onda.

trans-unit.source: To release the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>’s reference to the stream, reconfigure the synthesizer's output, for example, by calling <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para liberar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>de referencia en la secuencia, reconfigure el sintetizador de salida de, por ejemplo, mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For other output configuration options, see the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para usar otras opciones de configuración de salida, vea el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following example outputs a phrase to a WAV stream.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se da como resultado una frase en una secuencia WAV.

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output synchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Genera voz emitida de forma sincrónica desde una cadena, un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> o un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> métodos generan voz de forma sincrónica.

trans-unit.source: The methods do not return until the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> instance has been completely spoken.
trans-unit.target: Los métodos no devuelven hasta que el contenido de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> instancia se ha hablado completamente.

trans-unit.source: This is the simplest way to generate speech.
trans-unit.target: Se trata de la manera más sencilla de generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: However, if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method to generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, si la aplicación necesita realizar tareas mientras habla, por ejemplo texto resaltado, paint animación, controles de monitor u otras tareas, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> métodos o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método para generar voz de forma asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una llamada a este método, el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> puede provocar los eventos siguientes:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el estado de habla del sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando el sintetizador empiece a generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez que el sintetizador alcanza una letra o una combinación de letras que constituyen un sonido discreto de voz en un idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cada vez que el sintetizador completa habla una palabra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez salida de voz requiere un cambio en la posición de la boca o los músculos faciales que se usa para generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cuando el sintetizador encuentra un marcador en un símbolo del sistema.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el tono de voz para el sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> no provoca la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos durante el procesamiento de cualquiera de los <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: El contenido para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: De forma sincrónica habla el contenido de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" />.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hablar de forma asincrónica el contenido de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto, utilice <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto de una cadena y el objeto se pasa como argumento a la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: El contenido para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: De forma sincrónica habla el contenido de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hablar de forma asincrónica el contenido de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto, utilice <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto de una cadena y el objeto se pasa como argumento a la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: Texto para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: De forma sincrónica habla el contenido de una cadena.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para hablar de forma sincrónica una cadena que contiene el marcado SSML, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para hablar de forma asincrónica el contenido de una cadena, utilice el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Como se muestra en el ejemplo siguiente, la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método proporciona los medios más simples para generar la voz de salida sincrónicamente.

trans-unit.source: Generates speech output asynchronously from a string, a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object, or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Genera voz emitida de forma asincrónica desde una cadena, un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> o un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods generate speech asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> métodos generan voz de forma asincrónica.

trans-unit.source: The methods return immediately without waiting for the content of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> object to finish speaking.
trans-unit.target: Los métodos devuelven inmediatamente sin esperar a que el contenido de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> objeto termine de hablar.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> if your application needs to perform tasks while speaking, for example highlight text, paint animation, monitor controls, or other tasks.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> si la aplicación necesita realizar tareas mientras habla, por ejemplo resaltar texto, pintar animación, controles de monitor u otras tareas.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una llamada a este método, el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> puede provocar los eventos siguientes:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el estado de habla del sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando el sintetizador empiece a generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez que el sintetizador alcanza una letra o una combinación de letras que constituyen un sonido discreto de voz en un idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cada vez que el sintetizador completa habla una palabra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez salida de voz requiere un cambio en la posición de la boca o los músculos faciales que se usa para generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cuando el sintetizador encuentra un marcador en un símbolo del sistema.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el tono de voz para el sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando finaliza el sintetizador un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operación.

trans-unit.source: If your application does not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Si la aplicación no necesita realizar tareas mientras habla, puede usar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> métodos o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método para generar la voz sincrónicamente.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: El contenido para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" /> object.
trans-unit.target: De forma asincrónica habla el contenido de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt" />.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Puede cancelar la hablando asincrónica de un símbolo del sistema con el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hablar de forma sincrónica el contenido de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto, utilice <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto de una cadena y el objeto se pasa como argumento a la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The content to speak.
trans-unit.target: El contenido para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: De forma asincrónica habla el contenido de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el objeto que contiene el contenido para hablar.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hablar de forma sincrónica el contenido de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto, utilice <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object from a string and passes the object as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto de una cadena y el objeto se pasa como argumento a la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The text to speak.
trans-unit.target: Texto para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks the contents of a string.
trans-unit.target: De forma asincrónica habla el contenido de una cadena.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that contains the content to speak.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el objeto que contiene el contenido para hablar.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para hablar de forma asincrónica una cadena que contiene el marcado SSML, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak the contents of a string, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para hablar de forma sincrónica el contenido de una cadena, utilice el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Puede cancelar la hablando asincrónica de un símbolo del sistema con el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: As shown in the following example, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> method provides the simplest means to generate speech output asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Como se muestra en el ejemplo siguiente, la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> método proporciona los medios más simples para generar la voz de forma asincrónica de salida.

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: El contenido para el que se va a cancelar una operación de habla.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Cancela la operación asincrónica de síntesis para un mensaje en cola.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following:
trans-unit.target: También puede utilizar este método para cancelar una asincrónica hablan operación para lo siguiente:

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: El contenido de un <xref:System.String> especificado por un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: El contenido de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> especificado por un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El contenido de un <xref:System.String> que contiene SSML especificado por un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech crea un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto y lo rellena con el contenido del parámetro del método y devuelve el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Si mantiene una copia de devuelto <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, puede pasar en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> para cancelar habla contenido especificado en un <xref:System.String> o un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Cancela todas las operaciones de síntesis de voz asincrónicas que hay en cola.

trans-unit.source: The following example show a use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> to cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt, so that a new prompt can be spoken.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un uso de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> para cancelar la hablando asincrónica de un símbolo del sistema, por lo que se puede hablar un nuevo símbolo del sistema.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event fires when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> operation is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> evento desencadena cuando un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> se cancela la operación.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> termina de leer un mensaje.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> provoca la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> el evento en la finalización de cualquiera de los <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> clase no tiene propiedades y no devuelve datos desde el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Se proporciona para habilitar los autores de aplicaciones escribir controladores de eventos para el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se genera después de que <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> hable cada palabra concreta de un mensaje.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera este evento para cada palabra nueva que habla en un símbolo del sistema mediante cualquiera de los <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo y obtener más información acerca de los datos asociados al evento, vea <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The SSML string to speak.
trans-unit.target: Cadena SSML para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: De forma sincrónica habla un <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contiene el marcado SSML.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: El contenido de la `textToSpeak` parámetro debe incluir un `speak` elemento y debe ajustarse a la [lenguaje de marcado de síntesis de voz (SSML) versión 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [referencia del lenguaje de marcado de síntesis de voz](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para hablar de forma asincrónica una cadena que contiene el marcado SSML, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> para iniciar el habla sincrónica de una cadena que no contiene el marcado SSML.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una llamada a este método, el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> puede provocar los eventos siguientes:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el estado de habla del sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando el sintetizador empiece a generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez que el sintetizador alcanza una letra o una combinación de letras que constituyen un sonido discreto de voz en un idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cada vez que el sintetizador completa habla una palabra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez salida de voz requiere un cambio en la posición de la boca o los músculos faciales que se usa para generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cuando el sintetizador encuentra un marcador en un símbolo del sistema.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el tono de voz para el sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> no provoca la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> eventos mientras se procesaba la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example renders the date 1/29/2009 as a date, in month, day, year order.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se presenta la fecha 1/29/2009, como una fecha, mes, día, orden de año.

trans-unit.source: The SMML markup to speak.
trans-unit.target: El marcado de SMML para hablar.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: De forma asincrónica habla un <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contiene el marcado SSML.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: El contenido de la `textToSpeak` parámetro debe incluir un `speak` elemento y debe ajustarse a la [lenguaje de marcado de síntesis de voz (SSML) versión 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [referencia del lenguaje de marcado de síntesis de voz](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para hablar de forma sincrónica una cadena que contiene el marcado SSML, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> to initiate the asynchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> para iniciar el habla asincrónica de una cadena que no contiene el marcado SSML.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events:
trans-unit.target: Durante una llamada a este método, el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> puede provocar los eventos siguientes:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el estado de habla del sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando el sintetizador empiece a generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez que el sintetizador alcanza una letra o una combinación de letras que constituyen un sonido discreto de voz en un idioma.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cada vez que el sintetizador completa habla una palabra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: Genera cada vez salida de voz requiere un cambio en la posición de la boca o los músculos faciales que se usa para generar la voz.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se desencadena cuando el sintetizador encuentra un marcador en un símbolo del sistema.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando cambia el tono de voz para el sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes processing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando el sintetizador termina el procesamiento una <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> operación.

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Si los dos de la aplicación no necesitan realizar tareas mientras habla, puede usar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> método para generar la voz sincrónicamente.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> comienza a leer un mensaje.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera este evento cuando comienza a procesar un símbolo del sistema mediante cualquiera de los <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> clase no tiene propiedades y no devuelve datos desde el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Se proporciona para habilitar los autores de aplicaciones escribir controladores de eventos para el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el estado de habla actual del objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el estado actual de habla del objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener el nuevo estado de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> después del cambio, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> before, during, and after speaking a prompt.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el estado de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> antes, durante y después de hablar un símbolo del sistema.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando cambia el estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> genera este evento cuando su habla <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> cambios.

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo y obtener más información acerca de los datos asociados al evento, vea <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar y reanudar la síntesis de voz, utilice el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando se alcanza un visema.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Un viseme es la posición básica de la boca y de cara al pronunciar el fonema.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes son representaciones visuales de fonemas.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech admite 21 visemes para inglés de Estados Unidos, cada uno de los cuales corresponde a uno o más fonemas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> se generan eventos cuando un nuevo fonema alcanzado tiene un viseme correspondiente diferente que el fonema anterior alcanzado.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Puesto que algunos visemes representan más de un fonema, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> evento no se genera si el fonema siguiente alcanzado corresponde a la misma viseme como el fonema anterior.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words "this zone", a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the "s" in "this" and the "z" in "zone".
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, para las palabras "esta zona", un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> evento se desencadena para la "s" de "this" y "z" en "zona".

trans-unit.source: However, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> event is not raised for the "z" in "zone" because it corresponds to the same viseme as the "s" in "this".
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> no se produce el evento para la "z" en "zona" porque se corresponde con el mismo viseme como la "s" de "this".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: La siguiente es una lista de los grupos de fonema que corresponden a un viseme en inglés de Estados Unidos y 21 fonemas SAPI.

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información acerca de los datos asociados con el `VisemeReached` eventos, vea <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene información acerca de la voz actual del objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve información acerca de la voz actual del objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: Al inicializar una nueva <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, usa la voz del sistema de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> objeto para utilizar una de las voces de síntesis de voz instalada, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre los cuales se instalan las voces, use la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> método y la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> clase.

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> and gets information about the current voice.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se inicializa una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> y obtiene información sobre la voz actual.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando cambia la voz de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para un ejemplo y obtener información acerca de los datos asociados al evento, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Puede cambiar la voz que el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> utiliza con cualquiera de los <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> métodos o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el volumen de salida del objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el volumen de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />, de 0 a 100.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the volume of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s audio output for the synthesized voice and the WAV file.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se establece el volumen de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>de la salida de audio para la voz sintetizada y el archivo WAV.
